channel.title: Upgrade on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Upgrade on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes

item.title: b) Upgrade a Kubernetes cluster
item.description: These instructions describe how to upgrade a Kubernetes cluster created using kubeadm on which an Oracle Unified Directory Services Manager instance is deployed. A rolling upgrade approach is used to upgrade nodes (master and worker) of the Kubernetes cluster. It is expected that there will be a down time during the upgrade of the Kubernetes cluster as the nodes need to be drained as part of the upgrade process. Prerequisites Review Prerequisites and ensure that your Kubernetes cluster is ready for upgrade.
